name: Ritimkosu
description:
-You get 1 bullet when you jump on colored tiles!

Summary:

Color tiles are connected to music board, sync them to reach the ending.

Made in 48 hours for GMTK jam, solo developer

Controls:

  • Movement:  W, A, S, D
  • Jump: Space
  • Sprint: Left Shift
  • Shoot: LMB 
  • T: Restart Level
  • ESC: Pause Game

Cheats:

  • (1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 0): Change Level
  • (9): Scores
  • (L):  Activate all tiles
